structure.unit: B HOUSING, BUILDINGS, AND CONSTRUCTION - BUILDING CODE

law.catch_line: Exemptions from requirements of KRS 198B.700 to 198B.738.
law.history: Amended 2011 Ky. Acts ch. 100, sec. 4, effective June 8, 2011. -- Amended 2010 Ky. Acts ch. 24, sec. 298, effective July 15, 2010. -- Created 2004 Ky. Acts ch. 109, sec. 2, effective July 13, 2004.
